features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate floral motif throughout, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The delicate filigree and pave setting further enhance the brilliance of the diamonds. Adjustable chain length is provided for a perfect fit.

occasions: or any occasion where you desire to make a lasting impression. This statement piece beautifully complements traditional silk sarees and contemporary gowns alike.
description: This Diamond Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a heirloom. The timeless design, superior craftsmanship, and exceptional quality materials ensure it will be treasured for generations. The use of genuine diamonds and gold with Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting value and brilliance. Each stone is hand-selected and carefully set for maximum sparkle.
